mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO student_question_score ( exam_id, student_id, question_id, score_id, answer, score, status ) VALUES
(#{record.examId}, #{record.studentId}, #{record.questionId}, #{record.scoreId}, #{record.answer}, #{record.score}, #{record.status})

update.foreach: UPDATE student_question_score SET score = #{record.score}, status = 1 WHERE record_id = #{record.recordId}

mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) as total_answers, SUM(CASE WHEN score = epq.question_score THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as correct_count, CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN score = epq.question_score THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(1), 0) AS DECIMAL(5,2)) as correct_rate FROM student_question_score sqs INNER JOIN exam_paper_question epq ON sqs.question_id = epq.question_id AND sqs.exam_id = #{examId} WHERE sqs.question_id = #{questionId}

SELECT CASE WHEN (score / epq.question_score * 100) >= 90 THEN '90-100%' WHEN (score / epq.question_score * 100) >= 80 THEN '80-89%' WHEN (score / epq.question_score * 100) >= 70 THEN '70-79%' WHEN (score / epq.question_score * 100) >= 60 THEN '60-69%' ELSE '0-59%' END as score_range, COUNT(1) as count, CAST(COUNT(1) * 100.0 / SUM(COUNT(1)) OVER() AS DECIMAL(5,2)) as percentage FROM student_question_score sqs INNER JOIN exam_paper_question epq ON sqs.question_id = epq.question_id AND sqs.exam_id = #{examId} WHERE sqs.question_id = #{questionId} GROUP BY CASE WHEN (score / epq.question_score * 100) >= 90 THEN '90-100%' WHEN (score / epq.question_score * 100) >= 80 THEN '80-89%' WHEN (score / epq.question_score * 100) >= 70 THEN '70-79%' WHEN (score / epq.question_score * 100) >= 60 THEN '60-69%' ELSE '0-59%' END ORDER BY score_range DESC

SELECT CASE WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, es.student_start_time, es.student_submit_time) <= 5 THEN '0-5分钟' WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, es.student_start_time, es.student_submit_time) <= 10 THEN '6-10分钟' WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, es.student_start_time, es.student_submit_time) <= 15 THEN '11-15分钟' ELSE '15分钟以上' END as time_range, COUNT(1) as count, CAST(COUNT(1) * 100.0 / SUM(COUNT(1)) OVER() AS DECIMAL(5,2)) as percentage FROM student_question_score sqs INNER JOIN exam_student es ON sqs.student_id = es.student_id AND sqs.exam_id = es.exam_id WHERE sqs.question_id = #{questionId} AND sqs.exam_id = #{examId} GROUP BY CASE WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, es.student_start_time, es.student_submit_time) <= 5 THEN '0-5分钟' WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, es.student_start_time, es.student_submit_time) <= 10 THEN '6-10分钟' WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, es.student_start_time, es.student_submit_time) <= 15 THEN '11-15分钟' ELSE '15分钟以上' END ORDER BY MIN(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, es.student_start_time, es.student_submit_time))

SELECT q.*, CAST(AVG(sqs.score / epq.question_score) * 100 AS DECIMAL(5,2)) as avg_score_rate, COUNT(1) as answer_count, MIN(sqs.score / epq.question_score * 100) as min_score_rate, MAX(sqs.score / epq.question_score * 100) as max_score_rate FROM student_question_score sqs INNER JOIN question q ON sqs.question_id = q.question_id INNER JOIN exam_paper_question epq ON sqs.question_id = epq.question_id AND sqs.exam_id = #{examId} GROUP BY q.question_id, q.qb_id, q.content, q.answer, q.type, q.difficulty HAVING avg_score_rate < 60 ORDER BY avg_score_rate LIMIT #{limit}

SELECT q.*, CAST(AVG(sqs.score / epq.question_score) * 100 AS DECIMAL(5,2)) as avg_score_rate, COUNT(1) as answer_count, MIN(sqs.score / epq.question_score * 100) as min_score_rate, MAX(sqs.score / epq.question_score * 100) as max_score_rate FROM student_question_score sqs INNER JOIN question q ON sqs.question_id = q.question_id INNER JOIN exam_paper_question epq ON sqs.question_id = epq.question_id AND sqs.exam_id = #{examId} GROUP BY q.question_id, q.qb_id, q.content, q.answer, q.type, q.difficulty HAVING avg_score_rate > 90 ORDER BY avg_score_rate DESC LIMIT #{limit}

SELECT q.type, COUNT(1) as question_count, CAST(AVG(sqs.score / epq.question_score) * 100 AS DECIMAL(5,2)) as avg_score_rate, MIN(sqs.score / epq.question_score * 100) as min_score_rate, MAX(sqs.score / epq.question_score * 100) as max_score_rate FROM student_question_score sqs INNER JOIN question q ON sqs.question_id = q.question_id INNER JOIN exam_paper_question epq ON sqs.question_id = epq.question_id AND sqs.exam_id = #{examId} WHERE sqs.student_id = #{studentId} GROUP BY q.type ORDER BY q.type

SELECT q.type, COUNT(1) as question_count, SUM(sqs.score) as total_score, SUM(epq.question_score) as total_possible_score, CAST(AVG(sqs.score / epq.question_score) * 100 AS DECIMAL(5,2)) as avg_score_rate, MIN(sqs.score / epq.question_score * 100) as min_score_rate, MAX(sqs.score / epq.question_score * 100) as max_score_rate FROM student_question_score sqs INNER JOIN question q ON sqs.question_id = q.question_id INNER JOIN exam_paper_question epq ON sqs.question_id = epq.question_id AND sqs.exam_id = #{examId} WHERE sqs.student_id = #{studentId} GROUP BY q.type ORDER BY q.type

SELECT sqs.* FROM student_question_score sqs INNER JOIN question q ON sqs.question_id = q.question_id INNER JOIN exam e ON sqs.exam_id = e.exam_id WHERE sqs.exam_id = #{examId} AND e.teacher_id = #{teacherId} AND sqs.status = 0 AND q.type IN (3, 4) -- 填空题和简答题需要人工批改 ORDER BY sqs.record_id
mapper.update:
UPDATE student_question_score SET status = #{status}, grader_id = #{graderId}, grading_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE record_id IN
#{recordId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) as total_questions, SUM(CASE WHEN status = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as graded_questions, CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN status = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(1), 0) AS DECIMAL(5,2)) as progress_rate, COUNT(DISTINCT grader_id) as grader_count, MIN(grading_time) as first_grading_time, MAX(grading_time) as last_grading_time FROM student_question_score WHERE exam_id = #{examId}
SELECT FROM student_question_score ORDER BY record_id DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}

SELECT sqs.*, q.content as question_content, q.type as question_type, epq.question_score as full_score, CAST(sqs.score / epq.question_score * 100 AS DECIMAL(5,2)) as score_rate, es.student_start_time, es.student_submit_time, TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, es.student_start_time, es.student_submit_time) as time_spent FROM student_question_score sqs INNER JOIN question q ON sqs.question_id = q.question_id INNER JOIN exam_paper_question epq ON sqs.question_id = epq.question_id AND sqs.exam_id = #{examId} INNER JOIN exam_student es ON sqs.student_id = es.student_id AND sqs.exam_id = es.exam_id WHERE sqs.student_id = #{studentId} AND sqs.exam_id = #{examId} ORDER BY epq.question_order

SELECT q.type as question_type, COUNT(1) as total_count, SUM(CASE WHEN sqs.score < epq.question_score THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as mistake_count, CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN sqs.score < epq.question_score THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(1), 0) AS DECIMAL(5,2)) as mistake_rate, AVG(CASE WHEN sqs.score < epq.question_score THEN sqs.score / epq.question_score * 100 ELSE NULL END) as avg_mistake_score_rate FROM student_question_score sqs INNER JOIN question q ON sqs.question_id = q.question_id INNER JOIN exam_paper_question epq ON sqs.question_id = epq.question_id AND sqs.exam_id = #{examId} WHERE sqs.student_id = #{studentId} AND sqs.exam_id = #{examId} GROUP BY q.type ORDER BY mistake_count DESC
